entry.title: $1999 // SPACIOUS 1br in Prime Bushwick
entry.content:
Huge 1 bedroom in the best part of Bushwick!

Freshly renovated. Huge bedroom, and a large living room.

Steps from the Knickerbocker M and a short walk to the DeKalb L.

NO BROKER FEE!
Call, email, or text Dave to schedule a viewing!

entry.title: $2600 // Wow serious steal on prime block **FEB 1 *Visit this evening!
entry.content:
Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Marcy Av, Metropolitan Av. Spacious 3 bedroom apartment with hardwood floors. Just 1 block from the Marcy JM trains- you are 10 minutes to Manhattan!

Call or text us now: (9) one *7 threefourfive *4 * 1*zero *four

entry.title: $2400 // NO FEE - Large 1 BR/1BA 500ft from M train
entry.content:
Hi friends!


My gorgeous one bedroom in Bushwick is up for grabs! I've been here for two years, absolutely love it. I'm only moving to be closer to work!


This is NO FEE, all heat and hot water is included. My lease will end when I move out and your own will begin (it's unreal I know). You would just need to be approved by mgmt and that's it.


The apartment is a full, large, one bedroom, one bath, pet friendly! Open kitchen, microwave, dishwasher, dining area, separate living room and oversized bedroom windows! Located in the heart of Bushwick near excellent restaurants, cafes, stores, and bars. It is on Greene Avenue not even a block from the M train (Knickerbocker M subway stop), a 5 minute walk to the L train (DeKalb stop) and a 12 minute walk to the J train (Kosciuszko stop).


CAN BE FURNISHED OR NOT.


The Building:
*Backyard is huge with a firepit & grill & seating for a nice relaxing evening
*Every tenant has their own 9x10 garden plot
*Stainless steel appliances (with dishwasher and microwave), white oak floors, subway tiled bathroom and blackboard paint so tenants can draw on the walls!
*Access to roof deck with views of Manhattan
*Laundry is available in the basement
*Storage and bike storage is also available and FREE!


Move-in date can be Feb. 1st or 15th. Couples are welcome (lgbtq we love you all).


Please reach out with ANY questions you might have.


Cheers!
